меню «Модель сегментації»
2_TextBox_0: Slicer завантажує набір даних МРТ простати
1_TextBox_1: Натисніть кнопку «Додати дані» у вікні привітання 	Модуль Slicer
2_TextBox_1:
In the past decade, image segmentation has been powered by the development of deep learning algorithms (e.g. nnUnet by the German Cancer Research Center (DKFZ)/Helmholtz Research).


AI-powered segmentation tools can reduce the segmentation time and provide more reproducible results.
3_TextBox_1:
A is an AI algorithm that was trained to perform a specific task (e.g. brain tumor segmentation model).

The Weights of an AI model are small numbers that determine how  much importance the model gives to different image features.

During the Training phase, a Model learns patterns from data labelled  by experts and adjusts its weights to improve its predictions.

During the Validation/Test phase, the model is evaluated on a separate set of data not used during the Training phase.

During Inference, the model is applied to new datasets to perform the specific task it was trained for.
4_TextBox_1: This tutorial focuses on running inference tasks using various pretrained AI models for automated segmentation of anatomical and pathological structures.
5_TextBox_1:
This tutorial uses the pre-trained models of the MONAIAuto3DSeg Slicer extension.


The tool is designed to work on laptops or on average desktop computer without a GPU.
6_TextBox_1:
Натисніть кнопку «Створити нову сегментацію» на сторінці
«Застосувати»
7_TextBox_1:
Segmentation Task #1: Prostate.


Segmentation Task #2: Brain Glioma.


Segmentation Task #3: Whole Body Segmentation.
8_TextBox_0: Slicer показує результат сегментації простати на основі штучного інтелекту
9_TextBox_1:
AI-based Segmentation of Peripheral Zone (PZ) and Transition Zone (TZ) of the prostate on T2-weighted MRI Images.


Dataset:
msd_prostate_01-t2
msd_prostate_01-adc
10_TextBox_1:
Виберіть модель сегментації пухлини головного мозку
(BRATS) GLI
11_TextBox_0:
Введіть вхідні об'єми наступним чином:
Вхідний об'єм T2F: BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t12f
Вхідний об'єм T1C: BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t1c
Вхідний об'єм T1N: BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t1n
Вхідний об'єм T2W: BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t2w
Натисніть «Створити нову сегментацію» на кнопці «Застосувати»
Натисніть «Застосувати», щоб розпочати сегментацію
13_TextBox_0: Enter the model's name Prostate in the Segmentation model menu
14_TextBox_0:
У модулі «Додати дані DICOM»
виберіть пацієнта patient1 та
двічі клацніть на зображенні
CT_Thorax_Abdomen, щоб завантажити його в
Slicer
14_TextBox_1: Click on Create new segmentation on Apply
16_TextBox_0:
Виберіть вхідний том 6: КТ_Грудної_черевної_плоди,
Натисніть «Створити нову сегментацію» на кнопці «Застосувати»
Натисніть «Застосувати», щоб розпочати сегментацію
18_TextBox_1:
AI-based Segmentation of Neoplasm, Necrosis and Edema in Brain MRI images.


Datasets:
1) BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t1n (T1-weighted)
2) BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t1c (T1-weighted post-Gd)
3) BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t2w (T2-weighted)
4) BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t2f (T2-FLAIR )
19_TextBox_1:
Click on Add Data in the Welcome to Slicer Module

Click on Choose File(s) to Add and browse to the loccation of the Slicer datasets
20_TextBox_0: Select the module MONAIAuto3DSeg and enter the model's name Brain Tumor Segmentation in the Segmentation model menu
20_TextBox_1: Select the model Brain Tumor Segmentation (BRATS) GLI
21_TextBox_0:
Enter the input volumes as follows:

Input T2F volume: BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t12f
Input T1C volume: BraTS-GLI_00005-00-t1c
Input T1N volume: BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t1n
Input T2W volume: BraTS-GLI_00005-000-t2w


Click on Create new Segmentation on Appply

Click on Apply to start the segmentation
22_TextBox_1:
Slicer starts running the inference task

Once the segmentation is done, 'Processing finished' appears in the Slicer GUI
23_TextBox_1: Click on Show 3D to display the 3D segments in the 3D Viewer
24_TextBox_0: AI Segmentation Task #3: Whole Body Segmentation
25_TextBox_1:
AI-based Segmentation of the whole body.


Dataset:
CT_ThoraxAbdomen
26_TextBox_0: In the Add DICOM Data module, select the Patient patient1 and double click onthe image CT_Thorax_Abdomen to load it in Slicer
27_TextBox_0: Select the module MONAIAuto3DSeg and enter the model's name Whole Body Segmentation in the  Segmentation model menu
27_TextBox_1: Select the model Whole Body Segmentation TS1-quick
28_TextBox_0:
Select the input Volume 6: CT_Thorax_Abdomen,

Click on Create new Segmentation on Apply

Click on Apply to start the segmentation
29_TextBox_0: Slicer displays the results of the IA-based segmentation using the Whole Body Segmentation TS1-quick
30_TextBox_1:
The 3D SlicerMONAIAuto3DSeg extension provides fast AI-based segmentation of anatomical and pathological structures.


The module can run on standard laptop and desktop computers with no GPU.
31_TextBox_1: The 3D Slicer internationalization project and the 3D Slicer for Latin America project have been made possible by two CZI Essential  Open Source Software for Science (EOSS cycle 4 & 5) grants.
